title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message:
Macbook pro 15" 820-3332-A no liquid damage or anything, seems to work fine but plenty of errors from ASD related internal GPU and some others, heres the full ASD log:

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message: If it seems to work fine, leave it alone. OS version of ASD gives too many false errors.

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message: wanted to ask how can i be sure that it is ASD false errors but then im thinking to give it AHT and see what will be the results..updating.

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message: No issues found on AHT I guess its thermal paste and back to the costumer..

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message: Why did it come in in the first place?

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 8921"]Why did it come in in the first place?[/QUOTE]

Its a company that I work with they did ASD test on it and found those issues basically.

title: 820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
820-3332-A plenty of ASD Errors mostly GPU related
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 8981"]Return as no repair needed.[/QUOTE]

actually its on its way back, not turning on now.
